2.2. Measures

Identified Psychological Availability of Parents. Feelings Control. The brand new Feelings Regulation Survey (ERQ) [58, 59] are given to evaluate expressive suppression and you may intellectual reappraisal, a few specific feelings control actions which happen to be generally familiar with would negative and positive thinking in daily life. Callous-Unemotional Traits.
